note: Only the US states that regularly link their case surveillance to immunization information system data are included. Unvaccinated individuals are those who have not received any dose. Partially-vaccinated people are excluded from this analysis.
title: United States: COVID-19 weekly death rate by vaccination status
subtitle: Death rates are calculated as the number of deaths in each group, divided by the total number of people in this group. This is given per 100,000 people.

relatedQuestions.text: Our post on death rates by vaccination status
